snippet: Sean Whent, the interim Oakland police chief, was sworn in Wednesday as the department’s new chief.
abstract: Sean Whent, interim Oakland, Calif, police chief, is sworn in as the department’s new chief.
lead_paragraph: Sean Whent, the interim Oakland police chief, was sworn in Wednesday as the department’s new chief.

headline.main: California: Oakland’s Interim Police Chief Gets the Job
headline.print_headline: California: Oakland’s Interim Police Chief Gets the Job
